reviews.review_msg: The content itself is simple. She's nice and has an angelic voice, but overall she taught content that had nothing to do with the class (i.e history). It was a summer class, and she had pointless assignments w/ no clear grading criteria every week. Random projects... DO NOT take is u hav summer plans. If you did not attend she did not like you

Attendance mandatory which I wasn't fond of.. but overall amazing professor. She is so caring, attentive and always ready to help and accessible. Super understanding as well. Her lessons and assignments have points behind them. 110% would recommend and take again!
